title: Chris was professional and…
text: Chris was professional and knowledgeable. He also showed patience during the process. Despite a couple kinks, Chris made the effort to correct the situation which I was appreciative of.

title: Very Happy with the results!!
text: The overall experience was very good!   We had some issues with my home, no fault of the listing agent, Laura, who was very nice or Ideal Co.  They helped me get through the process,(especially Miranda from the Title Company). All worked out very well and we closed on 12/29/22.    I would definitely list with Ideal again, without hesitation.

title: My agent and her husband were a huge…
text: My agent and her husband were a huge help in correcting the many many deficiencies home inspectors listed their reports.  They were skilled negotiators who knew how to convince the buyer and buyer's agent that there were some issues the buyer would have to correct or accept.  My agent's husband is very handy with power tools and knew how to remove burglar bars and change locks.  I would give 4½ stars, if I could.  I gave four stars because I walked away with about $2,000 less than what I was expecting and hoping for for my massively (but not completely) renovated 4-bedroom 2-bath 60-year-old brick ranch style house in New Orleans that was not flooded by Katrina or any other hurricane.

title: Randy kept in contact with us (texting…
text: Randy kept in contact with us (texting or phone calls) answered our questions directly, was consistently courteous, professional and knowledgeable. He assisted us in completing documents electronically, sharing status of selling process and even though we were in another state, the procedures for the sale went fairly smoothly.There are apparently differences in our state counties as to the handling of easements, would suggest this aspect to be shared with agents working out of their home counties.In a future sale we personally would feel better if the potential buyer were not represented by the same real-estate company.

title: I would recommend my agent Andy to…
text: I would recommend my agent Andy to anyone that wants to get their property sold he stayed with me for a couple of let downs but he stayed the course & went above & beyond what was needed to get the property sold I consider him a friend. Thanks Andy for all you hard work it was greatly appreciated

title: Great experience
text: What made my experience great was that anytime I had any questions or need anything Carlos was Johnny on the spot getting it done for me. He loves what he does. I think the company is doing the right thing by having great customer services.

title: Dealing with Kim and her team made the…
text: Dealing with Kim and her team made the sale of my home a great experience.  I am a Canadian who owned a home in Arizona and had no experience in selling a home as a nonresident of the USA. Kim and her team along with her connections made the paperwork much easier for me.  Kim has a very pleasant manner and easy to work with I would recommend her and her team to anyone looking to buy or sell a home.

title: IDEAL AGENT is a very professional and…
text: IDEAL AGENT is a very professional and knowledgeable real estate agent. She is very attentive to her client's needs and wants. She follows up with you until the sale is completed. IDEAL AGENT is the best choice for your real estate transaction!

title: Katrina was awesome she went above and…
text: Katrina was awesome she went above and beyond for us. All the negative thing that happened was from the buyer and other realtor. I would call Katrina again in a heartbeat if I were to ever buy property in her area again

title: Very pleased with John & Ideal Agent
text: John did a really good job in staging and marketing our home. He also went to bat for us during the negotiations after we received an offer. Overall, we were happy with the experience and the ultimate outcome.

title: Very professional
text: Very professional, supportive through the entire processAlways available and calmed me down when I was stresses

title: GREAT relator
text: Easy to work with, knowledgeable and personable, however she was some times slow in responding to us but I would use Ms Jacob's again.

title: Our agent was very helpful in getting our property listed and sold, they did an awesome job
text: Our agent was very helpful in getting us information and with all that went along with selling our home, we were very pleased with the experience

title: Julia was very knowledgeable and kind
text: Julia was very knowledgeable and kind. The team as a whole were very responsive to my concerns. I’d recommend their services.

title: Don stayed with us for a long time and…
text: Don stayed with us for a long time and was very helpful.  At the end we needed contact with the new owner to make the transition.  That was delayed so we lost much of the opportunity.

title: Kayla Rodriquez was very helpful and…
text: Kayla Rodriquez was very helpful and knowledgeble.

title: Mikki was easy to work with and I felt…
text: Mikki was easy to work with and I felt she had my parents best interest at heart.

title: She was on like Donkey Kong from the…
text: She was on like Donkey Kong from the beginning. Just took a little longer to get my $$ but I got it!  Thanks Lisa!!!

title: Would use again
text: was nice to expect a cap of 4.5 percentHouse was sold in a timely mannerProfessional experiences as well as listingsand staff were great as well

title: Fulfill Jd's
text: Make listening to customers a top priority across the business

title: House was sold right away
text: House was sold right away. Christina on Mark Middleton's team was awesome. She gets a 5 star. Ideal promised what they advertise only taking 2 percent commission for their side of the transaction. The only issue was in the title company for closing. There were no itemized notations for fees so I had to request this be done which tied up the wire transfer a day. All else was great. I highly recommend Ideal Agent.

title: Some hiccups with staff & my tenant
text: Some hiccups with staff & my tenant. Hard to know exactly what the breakdown was but it seems staff was uninformed or overwhelmed. Repeated requests for information already provided. All smaller items in the big picture. The house sold at agreeable price in about 4 weeks after reducing price. Total realtor fees bone by seller was 4.5%. While some states may vary on this, it does represent a realization in Texas that 2% is not the only fee to consider.  Would recommend their service.

title: A very good experience overall
text: A very good experience overall. The only suggestion I have is that sellers should be kept better informed during the process. We were not informed we did not need to attend the closing so we assumed we had to and my husband took the day off from work. Also we were not contacted when the closing was completed until I reached out to find out so I could take care of canceling the electricity and canceling the insurance on that house.

title: Company met our expectations
text: Company met our expectations. Process was completed professionally. However, advertising that selling commission will be 2% is misleading. Most people believe (hope) that refers to entire commission. A reduction from 6% to 5% for entire transaction, although good, is not great.

title: We have only purchased a new home and…
text: We have only purchased a new home and are working thru the process of selling our existing home, which is the more important of the two transactions I'm afraid.  The agent is working hard but the market may yet make this an unpleasant experience (bought high, sell lower?).

title: Rose was professional
text: Rose was professional, ensuring we understood the difference between Colorado and Texas realty laws.

title: EXCELLENT service
text: EXCELLENT service! The local realtor we were referred too was very professional and a pleasure to work with. Plus we saved a little on commission as we paid 4 and a half percent instead of the usual 6 between our agent and the buyer's agent.  The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is the frequent and repetitive calls, texts and automatic emails from the "concierge". Sometimes several times a day. I appreciate the desire to be of service but once told we need no additional assistance, they should dial back the messages. It got irritating after awhile..:-). Other than that tiny annoyance, the experience was flawless.

title: The process was very smooth and the…
text: The process was very smooth and the house sold on the first day. Our agent told us that the buying agent said he was taking a beating on the commission......could not believe that statement. He walked through our house one time and it was sold. He made 2.5% for that, my wife and I kept more money from our home and gave less away. It is our home not his, he is used to 5%. Ideal agent kept our money in our pockets not the buying agents. Kenneth Bewick

title: Ideal Agent concierge was knowledgeable…
text: Ideal Agent concierge was knowledgeable and helpful, always with a positive attitude.She linked me with a successful real estate professional who communicated with me throughout the entire process - from preparing my current home for listing, guiding me through the necessary paperwork, presenting multiple offers over the asking price, and then helping me find my ideal next home. It was a great experience! I highly recommend Ideal Agent.

title: They did everything they could to make…
text: They did everything they could to make it easy for me. They kept me up to date on everything

title: My only complaint is that the realtor…
text: My only complaint is that the realtor that supposed to sell my house was not able to do it at the 2% rate. The reason I choose your agency was to save few dollars in commission; However  the way that both realtors behave was excellent.; Both were very professional and gave me the support  and encouragement that I need it. I don’t have any thing negative to report about them. I wish both of them the best. Thanks so much for your service.Mrs. Rodriguez

title: Pressure
text: Out of the 3 people we talked with one in person Justina very nice 1 that called my wife got her very upset with pressuring dates which were not needed With the key and leaving the property very close friends bought the place they didn't need that pressure

title: Our agent
text: Our agent, Sandon, secured a great photographer and was great at negotiating multiple offers. We did have to overcome one obstacle due to a subpar painting contractor recommended by the agent's office. Overall, the savings and professionalism was appreciated and we had a terrific result. Our first contact, Damien, was wonderful throughout the process.

title: Regarding Sale of 4773 Palma De Nova Ln
text: Dear Valentina Regarding the sale of my house at 4773 Palma de nova lane I had a real good Experience Ideal agent did everything Right -- Transaction was very smooth they did not create any unnecessary problems for me and all thanks to you. you Always call to ask me if everything is alright and if I need anything that I do Appreciate a lot-- so thank you very much and if I hear or know anyone that need your  services I will Recommend Ideal Agent without hesitat

title: The agent who took care of us
text: The agent who took care of us , Brandy Dufrene, was very good. She was efficient, articulate and very helpful. At the same time, she did not bother us with too many calls. Her presentation of our home online was excellent. We were a bit disappointed at having to pay 4% commission; but had to go with the flow. On the whole, this experience has been totally positive and painless. Highly recommended!👍

title: Debra was instrumental
text: Debra was instrumental, persistant in following up with me about my house in Hopewell, VA.  She is also caring.  When I had my surgery in September,  she called to check in on me.  I thought, what a wonderful suprise. She gave me great reviews on how well my house was stage and decorated.   That gave me great confident that my house will sell.  And, it did with the grace of God.   Thank You!

title: I interviewed 4 religious before Cody
text: I interviewed 4 religious before Cody. He was the best so in referring top agents I give you great ratings.. The final  His commission rate when the house finally closed was over 4%. If I say anything bad it's that you miss advertise when you say 2%. Otherwise your service was prompt plight and professional.

title: My Personal Review  Of Ideal Agent
text: My home sale experience thru Ideal Agent was a professional and courteous.The home was an older home and was a bit changeling in finding someone do some repair work to per the home inspector - but thanks to my RE agent's contacts, the repairs were done in a timely and cost effective manner.I would highly recommend this service to anyone selling a home.

title: Only problem is the closing agent…
text: Only problem is the closing agent company  since they seem not to know what they are doing. Can’t give you a 5star since they screwed 3 times and we have to guide and remind them what to do. The overall experience I have with the real estate agent is awesome especially Leah, Nicole’s secretary who had helped us tremendously and guided us to the smooth process of selling our house. Again, much appreciated. They are 5 star to us.

title: Shad Williams was a great agent and…
text: Shad Williams was a great agent and even when I explained that my daughter was going to buy the house, he remained true to his mission and helped both my daughter and I through the mess of a closing.I would definitely choose him if I had another house to sell

title: The only complaint I have is about the…
text: The only complaint I have is about the open house. The agent Brett assigned to be there turned and left the fireplace on in July of all months, and caused the air conditioner to stay on to try and cool the house down. It took an hour to get the temperature down to what we had it on. I really don't  blame Brett for that, but his agent.

title: I enjoyed working with Shannon
text: I enjoyed working with Shannon. I don't remember her last name. But she and my husband did not get along ( my husband's fault). They argued and Shannon quit and I called her back and she agreed to just work with me. The only thing was she was hard to reach. I had her number which always went to voice mail. Even my Lawyers' secretary could not reach Shannon. We sold another home before this one and the agent always called back with in an hour.

title: AS ADVERTISED
text: AS ADVERTISED, IDEAL AGENT PROVIDED THE BEST AGENTS SHANNON AND CHRISTY WHO HANDLED THE SALE OF OUR HOUSE IN TWO WEEKS AND FOR A PRICE ABOVE THE MARKET VALUE. THEY TOOK CARE OF EVERYTHING FROM SHOWING TO OFFERS AND ADVICE IN COMPLETING NECESSARY PAPERWORK. OUR COMMUNICATION WAS EXCELLENT. I WILL REFER IDEAL AGENT TO MY FRIENDS.

title: Ideal agent was very efficient
text: Ideal agent was very efficient. The realtor, Jon, was very professional and helpful and friendly.  The 2% commission possibility drew me in and once the process evolved, I realized that wasn’t going to happen. However, 4.5 commission is still a really good rate.  I would recommend Ideal Agent for anyone who is looking to sell their home.

title: Randy recommended listing our house for…
text: Randy recommended listing our house for $350,000 based on his in-house comp analysis. This contrasted with Zillow's $429,000 price. I agreed to list with Randy at $375,000 and we sold for $380,000, which was what the house appraised for. Good thing I didn't follow Randy's advice.Agent Robert was very pleasant to deal with, although I felt like he should have been a bit more communicative in keeping us informed during the closing process.

title: Use IDEAL AGENT for High Profits and Low Commissions
text: Michelle provided great advice on how to stage our home, had alluring pictures taken inside & out, advertised a "Coming Soon" to attract Buyers, and informed us there would be a bidding war. Within the first three days we had 17 people visit our home and 6 people made offers to buy. We closed the bidding and accepted an offer $37K over our original asking price. In addition, we only paid a 4% commission instead of 6%. I'd highly recommend using IDEAL AGENT and Realtors like Michelle if you want the most out of your home sale.Sincerely,Ed Moffitt

title: mearns road house
text: tom and al came to our home to do first visit, and it was simple easy and we felt confident in the program. house was listed 3.1 and by 3.8 we were sold  we decided to accept an offer where the couple had to sell thier house as well, it worked out well, and we continued to get cars in the driveway  and over 2500 views on various websites, the process with paperwork was easy and we had settlement in 45 days and would recommend the company to others . than ks for a great experience

title: Utah Sale
text: I used Ideal Agent for the sale of my house in Utah. The agent who was assigned to take our listing was terrific! He went above and beyond to provide great service. Ideal Agent followed up several times to make sure we were happy during the process and after.

title: All in all the 'most' I could have made was another $12,000 and it was not worth it.
text: It was very interesting.  Matt was the guy you recommended, I saw him once, Ben Haven, (I think) took over, I think he is very unexperienced.  I have been told that I could file a Senior lawsuit if I wanted.  I was never allowed to see or appraise the Inspection Report.  Ben's interpretation of it stated that the "Inspector stated the sewer ran under the driveway and needed blah blah...my sew is one the opposite side of the house, The inspector BROKE my pipe on my second sink in my room and flooded everything under the sink in the cabinet including the scatter rug and the main rug.  Ben told me that if I did complain they would pull out and all the dumb items listed would be published for the next seller....I had a close girlfriend that was an Inspector, I don't believe that they can get away with lying.

title: 2 things not to be negative
text: 2 things not to be negative, but constructive to help sellers better:1. Advise seller to make offers subject to a minimum of 48 hour consideration, to give  a chance to multiple offers.2. When home warranty is discussed, make it clear that the seller will pay for it, not to just say "is included". It's misleading.This selling of my property went very well, a little better than expected. I thank the broker for their help

title: It was a positive experience overall
text: It was a positive experience overall. I got an offer the first day it was listed but it was contingent on the sale of their home.  It was somewhat hectic waiting on them and their buyers bank kept rescheduling the closing. This was of course not the agent’s fault.  He was knowledgeable and personable. There were times when I would have liked to be kept in the loop a little more but happy with the process.

title: Ideal agent help me find a great agent…
text: Ideal agent help me find a great agent who worked  with me and get my house sold.She was great.

title: 2% versus 4.5%
text: Everything was great, the agent was on spot with all to do with selling the house and was very knowledgeable of the area. Didn't get the 2%, it would help if you had multiple agents in a area such as Asheville North Carolina to help the seller get the 2%, but saved me 1% anyway, good enough.

title: Everything went very smoothly and Andre…
text: Everything went very smoothly and Andre was on top of everything from beginning to end. My only suggestion is that I should have been able to meet him face to face at some point in the process.

title: Great way to save money and still get…
text: Great way to save money and still get great service from your real estate agent.  We had a little hiccup with our first agent but Raymond was great and got us more than we thought we could get with our house.  I would highly recommend Ideal Agent over all other real estate companies.

title: Working with David Pruitt was a bliss
text: Working with David Pruitt was a bliss.  Sale of my property in Phoenix was fast and without any hitches.  Service was great and returned phone calls were greatly appreciated.No hesitation in recommending or referring David to anyone interested in selling their properties through Ideal Agent.

title: Not a discount operation
text: Working with the team was a great experience.  They hired a professional photographer which really made the home pop on the internet.  They then printed up a very impressive brochure of the home.  Additionally,  listing the home was a collaborative effort with Greg and team very receptive to our input.  Great job!

title: Did good w sale of home
text: Did good w sale of home.  Agent did several open houses also.  The ONLY OPINION I HAVE IS THAT the OTHER AGENTS that showed the home were VERY DISRESPECTFUL of property.  Including leaving on the lights, doors unlocked etc.  When asked to go back and take care of these items, one agent slammed doors etc..  Overall, our agent was very good, respectful and took care of our needs.

title: The process was so easy and seamless
text: The process was so easy and seamless. Our agent Judy Reed was professional and so helpful in putting our fears aside. Our home was sold very quickly. I would definitely recommend Ideal to anyone who is looking to put their house on the market!

title: This company will approve your expectations right away.
text: There are lots of real estate companies nowadays and it's kinda difficult to determine which one can help you to solve your issues most effectively. This real estate company is considered to be very responsive, according to my personal view, and it can easily solve your housing problem in just a short period of time. Agents here are very friendly, they always can listen to your preferences regarding house choosing and find for you best options. I believe that people should always check companies before applying to them. I bet that this company will approve your expectations right away.

title: Originally I was told by an ideal agent…
text: Originally I was told by an ideal agent that the commission when selling my unit would be 2.5% for the buyer's agent. Then I found out the commission  would be 3%. Joe was great when selling my unit.

title: Thank god for Dan Axtmann from houlihan…
text: Thank god for Dan Axtmann from houlihan Lawrence There were many set backs and uncustomaryGoings on w this house sale and Dan kept us in loop every step of the way!  He answered my technical questions and offered his expertise which was so helpful!If he didn’t have an immediate answer, he’d say so and then find the answer!I never had to wait long for him to return calls, emails or texts did I didn’t reach him directly, which also was the case more than not!He really worked hard on our behalf and I’d endorse him 100%

title: Hi my name is Nathan green
text: Hi my name is Nathan green, I fell in love with this company but the agent really doesn’t have a good customer relationship but that’s ok I’ve got a good agent that pulls me through whenever.

title: Great Experience
text: As advertised, full-service top-rated local realtor agent at a discounted commission rate with followups along the sale process.  There is no reason to not give Ideal Agent a try, especially when seeking a seller agent, to let Ideal Agent recommend the candidate agents.  Definitely will use the service again.

title: The Ideal Agents did a great job
text: The Ideal Agents did a great job! Property had an offer within a few days!Special thanks to Kate and Logan for their consistent attention and timely follow-ups.Only issue was more clarity on closing cost fees.

title: The sales agent very knowledgeable and…
text: The sales agent very knowledgeable and helpful from the beginning to the very end. Mark really made my wife and I comfortable with the process hope to give him more business.

title: Lorrie was great
text: Lorrie was great, always available and ready to help.  The only negative I have is that I didn't make as much as I had hoped.  I was hoping for a 2% commission, but that didn't happen.  All in all, I am satisfied.

title: Response to my inquiry was fast from…
text: Response to my inquiry was fast from Ideal Agent. I was in contact with a realtor in my area within a couple of days. The realtor was professional and well organized. Communication between myself the realtor and members of the staff was good. I would use Ideal Agent again.

title: Overall I am happy with the outcome of…
text: Overall I am happy with the outcome of my sale.  I got 355 when asking 359 in a hot market in Denver.  I was eager to save money on the commission knowing the market would sell my house and I was selling solely to cash out. I did feel at times that I was getting minimal attention from the agent and wondered if it was due to the smaller commission. I was regularly reaching out asking for updates or status checks. But overall got the final offer within 2 weeks of listing and put more money in my pocket at closing.  I would recommend Ideal Agent and would use them again.

title: Bryan did a good job working with us…
text: Bryan did a good job working with us helping us sell the house.  The only problem we had was that the process of closing on the house took much longer than we would have liked.  This is because a mortgage was involved and the paperwork required was enormous.

title: Ryan did an excellent job coordinating…
text: Ryan did an excellent job coordinating the sales of my Wellington property.  He handled things expediently and professionally.  Pleasure doing business with IDEAL AGENT.Sincerely,Gerald E. Lawrence

title: Great Real Estate Agent Referral/Ideal Agent Shows Room for Improvement
text: The overall performance of Ideal Agent was excellent. They really did connect us with the perfect real estate agent. Chris our agent was wonderful, stellar performance! My only complain would be that I had originally decided to go with a previous real estsate agent. After I changed my mind, and then tried to reach out to the original real estate agent Ideal Agent referred me to and my origial contact at Ideal Agent, no one would return my calls or emails for weeks because they thought I was wasting their time.I ended up having to call back Ideal Agent 2 more times to finally get reasasigned to Chris who was perfect! Had Ideal Agent actually returned my calls and emails they would've received 5 stars. Due to the fact our new agent was sooooo wonderful it truly helped redeeem how I was feeling about Ideal Agent.

title: I contacted Melissa Gunn at ideal…
text: I contacted Melissa Gunn at ideal Agent. Give her my info. She connected my with a local agent and the rest is history. I received an full price offer in  a week. My home sold, excellent experience with ideal Agent. I would use them again without question.SM

title: A great way to get a good agent.
text: It was simple And I was hooked up with an agent that sold my house in 30 days. A painless way to find a good realtor, highly recommended. The savings is also a bonus.

title: Kim was very easy to work with
text: Kim was very easy to work with - has a great personality and she is very professional . She is patient and dedicated to her job. Additionally, Kim answers phone calls almost immediately. I am very fortunate to have worked with her.

title: Relatively Good Experience
text: Denise and I had a very good start.She was very knowledgeable and easy to reach if I had questions.  Throughout the process, she kept me in the loop. At the end, we ran into some snags with the Title company. But overall, a good experience..

title: Melissa was very helpful and courteous…
text: Melissa was very helpful and courteous and found the perfect agent for us.   Her agent Mary was very professional always there to help you made everything go smoothly.  Our experience overall was really awesome and I would Highly recommend them.

title: my agent was very professional  and…
text: my agent was very professional  and knowledgeable also very helpful in answering any  questions i asked would recommend this this friends and family with one exception would liked to see my listing agent with a buyer so could of saved a lot more monies

title: Ideal Agent found me a high quality…
text: Ideal Agent found me a high quality Real Estate agent in my area.  The agent was very knowledgeable and familiar with our area of rural Ohio.  We closed on a deal one week from starting the process.  I am very pleased with how everything was handled.

title: I was quickly referred to a well known…
text: I was quickly referred to a well known real estate company.  The property sold quickly for a reasonably fair price.  Based on my own research, I felt the property was worth more, but needed a quick sale to avoid having to continually pay the expenses of the home.  All in all, I am very satisfied with the manner in which the listing and subsequent closing were handled.  All of the individuals with whom I spoke during the course of the transaction, (from the real estate agent to the company which conducted the closing), were informative, pleasant and professional.

title: Great Service!
text: Great Service!I found Ideal Agent service to be extremely helpful. They connected me with a great realtor who provided superb service. I was able to move my property quickly. I couldn't be happier about the service provided to me!!

title: The agent who contacted me was most…
text: The agent who contacted me was most pleasant and took care with what I was trying to do.  She kept in touch with professionalism and sincerity.  I was impressed with her caring attitude.  \Things went well and I am pleased with the results.

title: Thank you Ideal Agent for setting us up…
text: Thank you Ideal Agent for setting us up with Mickey Arruda and his team. Very professional in getting our house sold in just a few days. Mickey and his team also helped us in the purchase of our new home. Thank you to the Arruda team and Ideal agent for all your hard work.

title: Everything was good
text: Everything was good. You need to make it more aware to users that the 2percent is for your agent but the buyers agent can get up to 3 percent. We are still happy.

title: Ideal agent and Becky made the process…
text: Ideal agent and Becky made the process easy and painless. It was actually one of the best real-estate  transactions I've had. The real-estate agent Brenda was fantastic and explained and guided me thru everything.

title: PLEASED
text: PLEASED  MIKE DID A VERY GOOD JOB. HE WAS PATIENT AND KIND. VERY COURTEOUS, AND PROFESSIONAL. I WOULD RECOMMEND HIM AS A REALTOR. THIS WAS MY FIRST TIME DEALING WITH A REALTOR. I WAS VERY PLEASED.

title: I had a good experience with Mary
text: I had a good experience with Mary and her group.  My rating of a 4 is only because there was very little interaction with Mary.  She has an assistant, Jen who does an amazing job. Thanks

title: Great Experience with Ideal Agent
text: Great company here with attractive commission structure.  Brandon was great to work with, very communicative and informed frequently throughout the selling process.  Highly recommend both Ideal Agent and Brandon!

title: Cindy
text: Cindy, was great! The house sold in less than two days. She always made herself available to answer calls. If I stayed in the NW I would definitely use Cindy again. I highly recommend Ideal Agent and Cindy Harris

title: It’s great to work with Bao Lay
text: It’s great to work with Bao Lay. She is very responsive, clearly describe each step of process. We could able to sale our condo in Houston within 3 weeks from listing.

title: Used Ideal Agent for bothe selling and…
text: Used Ideal Agent for bothe selling and buying in different locations. Both agents were very knowledgeable and provided great service

title: The first buyer bailed because of…
text: The first buyer bailed because of finacial problems. this took an additional month to sell. Things turned out OK though and I'm happy with the service and commitment of the agent.

title: Jeff Purcell - Bringing Valuable Experience to Table
text: Jeff Purcell’s many years of experience makes for valuable insight into all aspects of selling your home. He is honest, genuine & real and I would recommend him to anyone.

title: Selling our house
text: Derrick was very knowledgeable and personable. We think he could have been a little better at communicating and following up on things he said he was going to do. But overall a great job!

title: John was instrumental in us getting a…
text: John was instrumental in us getting a great price and helped with critical negotiations when we could not be there.

title: Seems like a good company that helps…
text: Seems like a good company that helps find quality realtors. Helps and reviews your proses going through buying or selling a home. A contact you can use for questions a third party.

title: Very good experience in my opinion
text: Very good experience in my opinion, the agent Mike Shanks was outstanding and always went the extra mile to accomplish the finale goal.

title: Very smooth process
text: Very smooth process.  Our agent in Greenville, SC was right on target with pricing and his marketing was beautiful.  Very happy with this service.

title: Our agent went above and beyond
text: Our agent went above and beyond. She helped us with several things after we moved out of the house and not in the community any longer. She was very friendly, kind and helpful.

title: Rodger did a great job in selling our…
text: Rodger did a great job in selling our house.

title: Pleasant and worthwhile
text: I am very pleased with my Ideal Agent experience. Everything went smoothly for the most part and there was nothing that could be complained about.

title: Fast turnaround and service
text: Fast turnaround and service. I thought commission was less but buyer agent got much more in closing not sure the reasoning for that but house sold fast. Thank you

title: We had a good experience
text: We had a good experience - we saved 25% while also getting a great price for our property. We'd certainly use Ideal Agent again!

title: Charles’ house
text: Am curious as to what the current value of my home is. I have completed a number of improvements since the initial build.

title: I thought my contract gave 30 days…
text: I thought my contract gave 30 days after closing but ended up 2 weeks do to misunderstanding and contract not being signed.

title: "As low as 2%"
text: "As low as 2%"BLUF: IA Hannah connected me with a local broker/agent Keller Williams (KW) without delay. Saved 25% on the maximum retail commission (4.5/6.0). I expected more savings, up to 66% off of 6%. To get the 2%, you need a buyer that is represented by the same agent as the seller.  I took the first offer with 4.5% total fee.  In hindsight, if I had waited for all offers to come in, I would have likely received an offer from my same agent, KW-- it could have been 2.5% less: $14,250 less fee.I think IA could have advised or suggested to wait for all offers; taking the hot market in consideration and to reiterate the potential savings of having an offer from buyer with my same agent. My KW agentIA/Hannah Allbritton was very kind and a pleasure to talk to and work with. I am thankful for the local Keller Williams subordinate agent that was assigned. Overall, I gave this experience a 4 of 5 stars.

title: Riverview,FL

title: Prior to reaching out to Ideal Agent
text: Prior to reaching out to Ideal Agent, I had an unfortunate 90 day contract with another realtor. Time lapsed and had a total of 3 people who looked at the house that I was selling. I spoke with Tina at Ideal Agent.. she then referred me to Andrea as her Top #1 Seller in my area. She was responsive and quick to reach out to Andrea, which in turn responded to me within 36 hour timeframe (it was the weekend). Andrea met with me on Monday and set up a showing for the Thursday of that week. She was professional, understanding and confidant that she could sell my house within 3 weeks. We got an offer shortly within that time frame and the new buyers were in by December (prepossession) - closing in January of this year.Andrea was very "on point" with her promises and follow through. Although we had settled for less than what we wanted, given the "market" in our area and its uncertainty, she had kept her promise in transaction and marketing of our house. As for Ideal Agent.com - I have and will continue to  let our "people base" know that hands down.... your company is without a doubt one to trust and the one to reach out too before searching for realtors in their chosen area.

title: I was a little surprised that there…
text: I was a little surprised that there wasn't a realtor sign placed in my yard, but overall everything was good.

title: Our local agent was very good
text: Our local agent was very good. It has been a long time since my wife and I have bought or sold property, so the change in the industry and document signage was foreign but easily learned. The marketing techniques utilizing social media and electronic document signing were very helpful. Only one snafu occurred. On the day of the originally scheduled open house, a younger associate of our senior agent was to show the property, but had difficulty opening the lock box to access the key to the unit. Unable to do so, instead of getting help to solve the problem or at least staying there to make a list of those we had hoped to view the condo, he left. We were very disappointed, especially because our broker thought it very likely that a "bidding war" could initiate at that point. The senior agent called and was appropriately apologetic and contacted one of the visitors who missed seeing the property but left his contact information with the neighbor. We ultimately sold the unit for the asking price for a total  realtor commission of 4.5%.We were very pleased with the Ideal Agent concierge who followed up with us at appropriate intervals.
